author: Sheena McGinley
title: Gossip | Pics: Kylie Jenner is now getting her hair tattooed...
text:
Yep, hair tattoos are a thing now, because the teens of today don't have enough to be maintaining...
Have You Seen Kylie Jenner's Hair Tattoo? Get The Look w/ @scunciHair - https://t.co/aJi6S0sHam . #hair #beauty pic.twitter.com/vMuSF1Ei9h
— Nubia Mejia (@NubiasNonsense) October 21, 2015 It's such a big trend now, that this dude went and made a video all about it on YouTube... (WARNING - it's best watched on mute)
Now that this is the latest phenomenon is being endorsed by undeniably one of the world's biggest celebrities, twitter has a very pressing question for you...
Would you ever brandish your barnet with a hair tattoo? https://t.co/bXX3Ju4iyf pic.twitter.com/mK5W6oQHf0
— Stylist Magazine (@StylistMagazine) October 22, 2015
Perhaps you beed a bit more information before you commit. Mashable have done some research on your behalf, and here are their findings. The tattoos are by Scünci , and they "apply directly to your hair. The metallic designs adhere (aka 'stick') to your tresses with a wet cloth and wash out with shampoo. The tattoos are available for $4.99 at Ulta and Target stores."
MORE: Watch: Kylie Jenner gets $320k Rolls Royce Ghost for her 18th. Also has Instagram doppleganger
MORE: Pic: Kylie Jenner posts picture of her wearing flesh coloured Spanx. Internet slightly bemused
